description: Web states a prices tag of $64.00, Doing business as in the State of Utah - Enforcement of rules from the State of Georgia. Complete with NAG screen, and only good for one year or until the next major version is released ( Proprietary code ). Last Stated update in 2023 (on main web site ).

This was literally 2 minutes to set up. 

While it may be proprietary, if you need automating banking integration, then you need the one-time paid version. I chose to pay, because it compares well to other proprietary online PaaS solutions that store your data on their servers. I want to keep my data file locally. I can set the format and currency symbol. It does exactly what I need.
